title: Cult - Birmingham, The Academy 2008-02-28 FLAC
description:
Cult - Birmingham, The Academy
28 February 2008 (yes, yesterday . . .)

Lineage: Sony ECN-719 mic > Edirol R-09 @ 16bit/48khz > Audition (cuts, normalising, adjusting balance & a little frequency adjusting to bring out the guitar) >FLAC level 5

48khz means that you have to convert to 44.1khz if you want to burn to CD.

Position: Upstairs, left of centre by about 15 feet. About 45-50 feet from the stage at a guess.

A good fun gig: cock rock at it&#039;s finest. One of the support bands was Theatre Of Hate and Billy Duffy joined them onstage for "Do You Believe In The Westworld?" It was the highlight of their performance . . . .

It would have been nice to hear The Witch or Ressurection Joe for once but this was made up for by the comment made by my mate as we left after the show:

"I really enjoyed that. It was great. Shame they didn&#039;t do Love Removal Machine though . . ."

Tracks:

01 Spirit Walker
02 Rain
03 Lil Devil
04 Diamonds
05 Sun King
06 Peace Dog
07 Edie (Ciao Baby)
08 Horse Nation
09 Savages
10 Sweet Soul Sister
11 Rise
12 Dirty Little Rockstar
13 Wildflower
14 She Sells Sanctuary
15 Waiting For The Encore
16 Phoenix
17 Fire Woman
18 Love Removal Machine
